nodes.text: Spearhead was a Gungan city on Naboo in 3000 BBY.

A fortress-city, Spearhead was the headquarters of rogue warlord Boss Rogoe. The fortress was divided between surface and submerged buildings and was said never to have fallen in the history of Gungan warfare.

The city's walls fell as it came under siege of Boss Gallo's united Gungan Grand Army and the Bongomeken Collective during the Raid on Spearhead. Rogoe was killed, and Gallo built a new city on the grounds of Spearhead to serve as a capital for the newly united Gungan people.
Spearhead appears in the third mission of the Gungan campaign in the 2001 video game Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds and its 2002 expansion pack Clone Campaigns.
